root: ^I was playing at the backyard when I accidently broke Mom's favorite garden gnome. What do I do?
^Lie to Mom that I have no idea about who did it
^Make up a story about the neighbors' dog that ran up to our backyard and broke it
^Admit it was me and say I'm sorry

res1: ^Unfortunately, our neighbor saw me, she told Mom everything. I think Mom hates me now
^I was playing at the backyard when I accidently broke Mom's favorite garden gnome. I tried saying it wasn't me, but our neighbor had seen me and sold me out.
res2: ^It turned out our neighbors were away in the country all day. Now, Mom knows I lied, so I think I'm going to get it!

^I was playing at the backyard when I accidently broke Mom's favorite garden gnome. I lied that it was the neighbors' dog, but my lying was disclosed cuz the neighbors and their dog had been away in the countryside all day.
res3: ^I wandered around all day, and in the evening, the police got me. The worst day ever!
^I was playing at the backyard when I accidently broke Mom's favorite garden gnome. After that, I ran away from home, but the police caught me and returned home.
res4: ^Mom gave me a hard time for the broken gnome, but finally she forgave me and game me a kiss. Happy end!
^I was playing at the backyard when I accidently broke Mom's favorite garden gnome. I confessed what I did, and Mom gave me a hard time but finally forgave me.
